text: The Sleeping Dragon bides its time, patiently hiding its claws until the perfect moment to awake.
In patience, the urgent learns the art of grace.
It does not matter how slowly you walk, as long as you do not stop.
Keep your intents hidden by sealing your mouth as if it were a bottle.
As light and shadow entwine and dance, the true, balanced essence of harmony is revealed.
No matter how tall the mountain, it cannot block the sun.
A tiger does not listen to the insults of sheep.
When a sagacious ruler does well, his people will think they did the work themselves.
With bursting energy, the dragon's roar cleaves the skies asunder.
[[b]]Heavenly Balance[[/b]] can be increased by offensive battles, enemy casualites, and assignments.
[[b]]Heavenly Balance[[/b]] can be decreased by defensive battles, friendly casualities and assignments.

The universe is governed by the cycles of the Yin and the Yang, dual energies that, when kept in equal measure, ensure harmony and balance in all things. One cannot exist without the other, there is no light without darkness, no up without down.
• Heavenly Balance is a dual sided resource, units and characters.
• Units gain extra experience and reduced upkeep
• Characters gain extra experience and reduced salary
• Units is gained through offensive battles, while Characters are gained through defensive battles

The universe is governed by the cycles of the Yin and the Yang, dual energies that, when kept in equal measure, ensure harmony and balance in all things. One cannot exist without the other, there is no light without darkness, no up without down.

The universe is governed by the cycles of the Yin and the Yang, dual energies that, when kept in equal measure, ensure harmony and balance in all things. One cannot exist without the other, there is no light without darkness, no up without down.
The best plans are sometimes neither subtle or quiet. Have your official act decisively, and let your intentions be known to all under the Heavens.
Your attendant will work on devious ploys in utmost secrecy, with subtle schemes akin to a dagger hidden in one's sleeve.
